layers.purpose: Anchor civic authorisation for all stack operations through community ratification and renewal checkpoints.
obligations: Layer stewards \shall{record ratification outcomes and quorum data} within the civic charter manifest.
Custodians \shall{publish renewal schedules and escalation triggers} aligned with Appendix~B timelines.
Oversight councils \should{link breach notices to public remediation briefings} in Appendix~K portals.

layers.purpose: Translate institutional values into enforceable, testable commitments for development teams.
obligations: Charter custodians \shall{encode each value as a control clause} with measurable acceptance criteria.
Compliance leads \shall{log amendments within seven days} of approval in the charter change ledger.
Narrative editors \should{synchronise terminology with the semantic registry} to avoid drift.
layers.verification_artefact: Ethical charter ledger with amendment diff, approval signatures, and semantic crosswalk.

example.caption: Ethical charter clause

layers.purpose: Govern lifecycle stewardship of civic data, ensuring lawful collection, minimised retention, and restitution paths.
obligations: Data custodians \shall{publish lawful basis statements} for every dataset prior to ingestion.
Privacy officers \shall{open an incident ticket within 24 hours} of discovering exposure or misuse.
Programme owners \should{issue stewardship summaries to affected communities} with remediation progress.
layers.verification_artefact: Data stewardship register including consent proofs, minimisation checks, and incident references.

layers.purpose: Document model design, testing, and release evidence so iterative changes remain accountable.
obligations: Engineering leads \shall{complete model cards before promotion} to production environments.
Product owners \shall{link evaluation datasets and risks} to each release decision.
Safety reviewers \should{flag residual hazards with mitigation timelines} and accountable owners.
layers.verification_artefact: Model development package containing model card, evaluation matrix, and mitigation ledger.

layers.purpose: Maintain auditable command channels so human directives cannot silently override safeguards.
obligations: Operators \shall{log every instruction session with participant identity and purpose} before execution.
Control stewards \shall{bind contested instructions to interpretive trace packages} for review context.
Oversight reviewers \should{summarise anomalies and corrective steps} for publication in Layer~7 reports.
layers.verification_artefact: Instruction control dossier including session transcripts, access approvals, and remediation notes.

example.caption: Instruction log snippet

layers.purpose: Preserve contestable reasoning trails between humans and systems to surface persuasion risks and civic impacts.
obligations: Dialogue stewards \shall{archive transcripts and semantic diff reports} for significant deliberations.
Facilitators \shall{document vocabulary reconciliations} before publishing policy effects.
Governance publishers \should{link debate outcomes to decision summaries} accessible to the public.
layers.verification_artefact: Reasoning exchange bundle with transcript hashes, semantic registry pointers, and decision outputs.

layers.purpose: Control deployment approvals, rollback readiness, and integration guardrails across operational environments.
obligations: Release managers \shall{attach decision rationale records} to every go-live authorisation.
Integration leads \shall{pre-register incident pathways} mapped to remediation teams.
Auditors \should{record oversight verdicts and risk acceptances} tied to the Governance Integration Index.
layers.verification_artefact: Deployment dossier with rollout decision memo, integration checklist, and pre-authorised fallbacks.

example.caption: Deployment decision record

layers.purpose: Guarantee timely, accessible publication of governance artefacts, audit findings, and civic responses.
obligations: Governance offices \shall{release decision summaries within statutory windows} using canonical templates.
Oversight chairs \shall{file audit coverage statements} aligned with transparency tiers.
Communications teams \should{cross-link public notices to evidence bundles} for reproducibility.
layers.verification_artefact: Governance publication packet including summaries, audit extracts, and cross-layer references.

layers.purpose: Sustain authentic civic participation with traceable inputs, feedback loops, and shared custodianship.
obligations: Custodians \shall{register participation events with attendance, consent, and influence statements}.
Engagement leads \shall{publish response memos within 30 days} showing how feedback changed obligations.
Facilitators \should{refresh accessible glossaries and onboarding materials} for new participants.
layers.verification_artefact: Participation ledger with session manifests, consent receipts, and response commitments.
